Sai uses his [[Super Beast Imitating Drawing]] to create three lions and a large hawk. The lions hit the opponent rapidly and send them upward, where the hawk waits and fires a barrage of razor sharp ink feathers at the opponent, covering them in ink and sending them crashing into the ground.
